name: Wax Lyrical With Quizzical | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is not a Harry Potter book. 'Harry Potter and the ... '?
questions.explanation:
Prisoner of Alcazar.

	There is a Harry Potter book called 'Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban'

questions.text: Which Island has a capital called Funchal?
Where did John Lennon and Yoko Ono marry in 1969?
The name of which 'Star Wars' character comes from a map of George Lucas' hometown in California?
questions.explanation:
C3PO.

	At reference C3 there is a post office (P.O.)

questions.text: Who painted one of the most expensive paintings in the world, 'The Portrait of Dr. Gachet', which was auctioned for 44.38 million pounds in May 1990?
Which film was not directed by American director William Friedkin?
options: To Live and Die in L.A. (1985)

questions.text: Teddy Bear, Big Smile and Moonwalker are all varieties of which flower?
Which model has the real name of Kate Price?
Which comic character lives at the Wrecktory, Outomy Road, Beanotown?
Just when you thought you were going to get them all right! Which Brit's father, Ronald, was awarded the M.B.E. for introducing Bottle Banks to Britain?
options: Davina McCall (Host of T.V.'s Big Brother)
